IN THE HIGH COURT OF JHARKHAND AT RANCHI

I, [Name], son/daughter of [Father’s Name], aged about ___ years, resident of [Full Address], District – [Name], Jharkhand, do hereby solemnly affirm and state as under:

documents.title: Legal Notice for Recovery of Money
documents.body:
From:
[Your Name & Address]
Advocate

To,
[Debtor’s Name & Address]

Date: [Date]

Subject: Legal Notice for Recovery of Rs. [Amount]

Sir/Madam,

Under instructions from and on behalf of my client, [Client’s Name], I hereby serve you this legal notice as follows:
